name: "Sales Savvy 101"
description: A simple yet durable multifunctional cart, equipped with metal rain eaves and ventilation ducts. This experimental vehicle, modified by Mondstadt merchants based on years of trading experience, is primarily used for selling alchemical potions. Due to the active nature of some alchemical potions, which are prone to failure during long-distance transport due to heat, humidity, or severe jolting, merchants devised an improvement by transforming the vehicle's original chimney into a ventilation chamber to address storage conditions. However, a perfect solution to mitigate potion failure from jostling has not yet been found, so this type of vehicle still has a long journey ahead before widespread adoption...
